item.title: 2021 SG House
item.description: In 2021 May, my wife and I become PR in Singapore.

item.title: F1 Score on Multi Classes
item.description: In multi-class tasks, there is always 2 kinds of trade-offs. One is the precision and recall: when tuning a classifier, improving the precision score often results in lowering the recall score.

item.title: Career Roadmap
item.description: Career is one of key compoenents in the life and one of the key metric of it is the compensation.
